```scss
// Property: videoQuality
// Description: Constant to indicate the video quality during capture.
// Component(s): CameraOptionsType
'.video-quality-high': { videoQuality: Ti.Media.QUALITY_HIGH }
'.video-quality-low': { videoQuality: Ti.Media.QUALITY_LOW }
'.video-quality-medium': { videoQuality: Ti.Media.QUALITY_MEDIUM }
```
